events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund as the size was not as expected.
The customer issue has been categorized under refund due to the request for money back on a recent order.
Assigning the case to our returns and refunds specialist team to handle the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I’m here to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for your refund request so we can proceed?
My order number is 123456789, and I would like to return the jacket because it does not fit well and is too small.
We can issue a full refund once the jacket is returned to our warehouse. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and for providing the return label. I’ll send the package back as soon as I can.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the full refund to your original payment method. Thank you for your patience.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now. Please feel free to contact us again if you have any further questions or concerns.
We would appreciate it if you could take a moment to complete a short satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
